website_summaries.verdict: A simple but quality bikini with adorable strap details.
pros: Simple bikini is elevated with bottom and back strappy details
Available in a wide selection of solid colors and patterns
Colors are vibrant and hold up well in the water
cons: Some complaints of bottoms being too loose in the front

customer_reviews.title: Great suit - great fit
customer_reviews.text: Great suit - I ordered it before my trip to Hawaii - it came on time and fit perfectly. Great value - material is quality and style is flattering.Worked well for semi active beach/hiking activities, kept everything in place. I was skeptical ordering a swimsuit online because I don't have the generic/average small girl body type that everything fits or can "make things work" - so I was happy it worked well for me! I'm 5'10" and 150-155lbs, 34C, size8/10. I ordered a medium; bottoms and top fit perfect, no weird muffin top or unflattering tight bottom issues (which usually I end up ordering large bottoms medium/sm top when I buy suits).
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Cute swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: I orderd XL. I'm 5'10" 185 lbs. It is very well made and has removeable pads for top piece. Back of top is very cute and strappy.
customer_reviews.author: bathkristie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. I am barely 5ft and about 102lbs. 34C/D and the small fits perfectly. I got the dark red and it's a gorgeous deep red color.
customer_reviews.author: Curls_and_canines

customer_reviews.title: Cute confy and sexy!
customer_reviews.text: Great design and fabrication! Looks better in person and great fit. Really very pleased with the material.
customer_reviews.author: ignacia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The quality was much better than expected. It ran a bit large for my liking but I like my suits snug so everything stays put. I originally ordered a medium and exchanged for a small. I am 5'6" 135lbs 34D. Small is great.
customer_reviews.author: dawn marie korte

customer_reviews.title: Good fit!
customer_reviews.text: A good all around family suit. Covers a lot but still has a sexy touch.
customer_reviews.author: Addict

customer_reviews.title: Great suit.
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the fit of this suit. I ordered a medium (5'6" 145lbs, 36C) and thought the bottoms and top fit like a charm. The back is VERY cool (but weird tan lines, of course) and the front is a little on the scoop neck side vs standard triangle top. The bottoms (though I don't have a pic) fit tight but not too snug once you're in the water (37" hips).
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Love this swimsuit! I'm 5'3 and 140lbs. I got a Medium. I have big hips and butt and the bottoms fit perfect and are very comfortable! The top is super cute and just what I was looking for! I highly recommend this suit!
customer_reviews.author: dustin

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: The top is very comfortable, but doesn't offer very much support. But I never felt like I'd fall out, even swimming and jumping off the dock. The bottoms were a wee bit small, and fit weird in the crouch. I ended up wearing them only the one time, and paired it with black bottoms I already had. I ordered a size small. I wear a 32DD in Victoria Secrets bras, and my hips are 36in. My only complaint is I wish you could order the top and bottoms in different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value, I’m pretty picky and spend a lot of time before buying to read reviews etc....I took the pic with the padding in (although not needed for enhancing), it was a great insert shape, and I actually might keep them in. Most padding I take out because it adds unwanted bulk. The blue is a deep water blue, and looks good against a tan. I will wear this is a sport bra/more supportive bralette as well as a swim suit. I really rely on photos which is why I add them when I can or think it’s important. I’m 5’1”, 130lbs (not in shape) and I still feel sporty, lol
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Cute swimsuit, XS fits a 13-year old of average height/weight
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find a good quality, cute swimsuit for teenagers, especially my picky 13-year old one. She's advanced past the kids sizes but is often too small for women's. We ordered this swimsuit in black, size XS. It fits her perfectly. I like that the top has padding (removable) to cover and support, but not so much that it looks like she has implants. The bottoms are a little skimpy for a mother's taste, but they cover her assets and have a cute strappy design along the sides. The suit has held up in a highly chlorinated pool and two washings on regular cycle. No shrinkage or fading so far. Great suit for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: HipShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great design, but size down!
customer_reviews.text: I love the style and fabric, but the bottoms were huge! The top fit, but not super snug. I ordered a large after reading reviews and ended up returning and ordering a medium (hope the top isn't too small). For reference I am 5'6, 153 lbs, 36' bust (36C), 33' waist, and 40' hips. Will review the Medium and post pics for reference once received. Normally, I order a large in swim suits (typically buy at Target).
customer_reviews.author: ahastain

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality, fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, excellent quality, fits perfectly. I purchased a small. I am 5'3" and 125 pounds. My bra size is 34B. The top and bottom fit perfectly. I was looking for a pretty bikini that will hold up to actually getting into the ocean waves and not worry about the top or bottom flying off if a wave hits me. This suit fits exactly what I was looking for in quality and fit. Neither the top nor bottom tie with strings; the top has a clasp (which was what I was looking for). I have other more revealing bikini top/bottom with strings for when I am just lounging around the pool or sunbathing at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: jeid

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and fit
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and fit! Very comfortable! I'm 5'5 and 155 lbs and it fits me perfectly! I'll be getting it in another color!
customer_reviews.author: Brantley Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a no fuss swimsuit, specifically easy to change in and out of at the gym. I absolutely love that the top is slip on, no need to fuss with clasps or ties! I am 5’3”, 105lbs, 34A/B, size 1 pants, no curves. I ordered a Small, the bottoms fit perfectly and the top is comfortable and not too tight. I did the jumping test and the top stayed put. Initial reaction to quality is good, but I just received it and have not tried it in water yet. Plus, the boyfriend loves the style of it better than any other suits I’ve had!
customer_reviews.author: Linh

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: I love the top! It has the perfect amount of coverage and I feel secure in it like nothing will pop out (lol). The strappy look is pretty cool and unique too. I've had it for over a year now and it has held up quite well. Will definitely be purchasing other colors. For reference, I am an A or B cup and purchased a small. It fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: AO

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received my bathing suit today. Wow. It’s BEYOND AWFUL. First of all, it looks nothing like the picture- it’s a totally different design. And it is made of the cheapest, most awful material. Sizing is completely wrong also. This thing looks like it would straight up discintigrate in water. You get what you pay for I guess. I read some of the positive reviews, but those seriously must be either paid reviews or the product had completely changed, because this swim suit is terrible. Not even worth returning. Straight to the garbage with this one!!!!
customer_reviews.author: mbl

customer_reviews.title: Great swimsuit, a little big
customer_reviews.text: Fits a little loose, ok with me though Bc I do not like swimsuits to fit so snugly that they cut into me. SUPER CUTE on, but very little support for women with larger breasts, (which may have to do with it being loose fitting.) the color is the same as the picture & looks great. Great for lounging, wouldn't recommend for activities unless you go down a size and get it to fit a little tighter! Size reference: I am 5'3, 160 lbs, D cup, and waist size 28. Ordered large and it fits, but a tad loose.
customer_reviews.author: Kirbi W.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a steal! My bikinis from victoria secret feel as good as this one. The material is great. The bottoms on me are a little baggy in the front area. I purchased the medium. Im 34 C, top fit and looked fantastic! Im 5’4” weigh 127 lbs, carry most of my weight on my thighs and hips. The bottoms fit great in the buttocks but like i said a little baggy in front. I will still keep and wear the top with different bottoms. Cant beat the price and great material!
customer_reviews.author: AD11

customer_reviews.title: Loved the top, bottoms were disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the top of this suit but the fabric on the bottom is super loose and baggy. :( Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Large busts should buy a larger size.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this suit. I probably ordered a medium, but my 34DD breasts were double-bubbling it. So I ordered a large and the top fits well. The bottoms are just slightly big. (I liked the medium bottoms' fit better, but you can't buy them as separate pieces.) I am a small bit worried that the straps are a wee bit skinny and will some day pop off and expose my breasts to the beachgoers, but they seem well-stitched to the cups, so I'm going to put it out of my mind. This is such a great style of suit of you want a bit more coverage up top than most suits provide.
customer_reviews.author: SHANNON FRASER

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT! Well made, super comfortable, and flattering. I was looking for a bathing suit while pregnant, and the large is absolutely perfect (I’m currently 160lbs)! Not tight, super comfortable. I am normally a medium (around 135lbs) while not pregnant and will be sure to purchase another when the time comes. I would say it definitely runs true to size.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Order more than one size to be sure.
customer_reviews.text: I likes the top in this bikini. I really disliked the bottoms. Someone had submitted a pictures of the front of the bottoms with a real poochie appearance. More pictures showed that it fit properly. So imagine my annoyance when I received the one with the poochie look. Yup there was enough room for man bits, if I had man bits. I have ordered 3 different suits by zeraca. None of them fit the same way. The price is right so I kind of mix and match and make the top/bottoms work.
customer_reviews.author: m Buckwild

customer_reviews.title: Correct sizing,  good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and correct sizing. I am 5'6" 122lbs small fits just right. I purchased pink, love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Zara

customer_reviews.title: This is so much better than i expected
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better than i expected. I'm 5'5" about 118 lbs and 34a-bish. I ordered a small and it is a perfect fit, both top and bottom. The bottom is good coverage, not too cheeky at all, covers nicely. It's a really good quality for the price, the padding in the top is thin enough to be subtle, but substantial enough. I would totally order this in other colors! LOVE!! Update also got it in the Greece vibes to mix and match with the black!
customer_reviews.author: Shasta

customer_reviews.title: I’m returning this... but you might have better luck
customer_reviews.text: The top was the correct size for my body and I’d say it matched the measurement chart, however, I felt it was a little unflattering. The bottoms, on the other hand were VERY unflattering and are why I’m returning the suit. You can see they’re super baggy and weird shaped, even though the waistline and thigh holes fit snuggly (I tried them on over my underwear if you’re wondering where the black lace came from in the picture). The red color is pretty, but the bottoms are ridiculous looking and the top is just “ok” so I’m not going to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: kp

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this suit. The color is perfect and is true to size. I’m 5”3 and 128 with 34C. Finding both a top and bottom that comes as one size is sometimes hard to find. This covers my butt and the sides aren’t to tight, not giving “the muffin top look”. Would def buy again and most likely will in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: NGat96

customer_reviews.title: YES!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Its always hit or miss buying stuff online, especially swimsuits but I was really happy with this purchase. I read in other comments that its baggy in the bottoms but the one I received was perfect. Loved the smoldering navy color and the top fit very well. I really liked the padding in the top, definitely better padding quality than most but I did need to take it out since I needed a just a little more room in the cup (36 D, ordered a large). I definitely want to order more!
customer_reviews.author: Victor Perez

customer_reviews.title: Cute suit
customer_reviews.text: Great suit! Made my boobs look amazing!! I'm a curvy girl, 5'6" about 165lbs with a booty and hips, and this suit was super flattering, I ordered a Large. I bought a couple other colors after my trip.
customer_reviews.author: discnut

customer_reviews.title: Sisterhood of the Travelling Kini!
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit is like the Sisterhood of the Traveling Kini. It looks great on everyone! I’m 5”3” 158 lbs, 36DDD and I got the large bc I can never find a top that fits. This one fits great! I wish you could choose sizes for the bottoms separate though bc the large is a little baggy on my butt. I ordered a medium after I ordered the large thinking I could wear the medium bottoms... nope. Gave me muffin top
customer_reviews.author: Sarahsmile

customer_reviews.title: Fits top AND bottom!!
customer_reviews.text: I am genuinely shocked that this suit fit! I followed the sizing for the top since I primarily needed a new top. With many other suits where the top and bottom are the same size, the bottoms tend not to fit since I am a 34DDD and typically a medium for bottoms. But BOTH fit and I'm so happy about it! The top is not super supportive so if you didn't buy your large assets I wouldn't recommend it but I did so it will work for the vacation that I need it for! I also love that it's a full coverage bottom that doesn't cut into the love handles :)
customer_reviews.author: Jen B.

customer_reviews.title: Fits and cute but cups warped after one wash
customer_reviews.text: Edit 8/10/19 changing rating to 1 star. After one wash, padding in one of the cups is warped so badly it’s essentially unwearable bec it looks so weird. (Warping is even visible under a loose fitting rash guard). Still love the color, shape, and sizing but buyer beware. Omg I love this suit! Ordered in the light pink color and it fits perfect (no bunchy bottoms as others have experienced). I am 5 7’, 125, 34A, and the small was perfect. Got to mix and match with other suits and it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Jlf

customer_reviews.title: Cute suit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Super cute design on both the top and bottom. Flattering fit and I absolutely love the strappy detail on the back !! Sexy without revealing too much. Bottom provides good coverage. But...I wish the top fit just a little tighter. I ordered a medium and for reference I am 5' 3" , 125 lbs, 34 c, waist 30" and hips 36". Bottoms fit perfect. The top is a tiny bit loose and doesn't provide as much lift or support as I would prefer. But then again I am super picky and for $25 this is still a descent suit. Looks really good on.
customer_reviews.author: mah

customer_reviews.title: Great suit
customer_reviews.text: I love this bathing suit. I actually ordered a 2nd one in a different color. The top fits great! Just enough coverage, but not to covered either. I love how comfortable the top is. It isn't tight around the back at all. I am about 5 6, 150lbs. I wear a 36 C. I got a large. The bottoms are a little big though. Which is usually the opposite problem I have. I have a decent sized booty. If I could choose my top and bottom sizes seperatly, I would probably order a lot more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Very flattering fit and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It’s so cute! I ordered a medium. I’m 5”4” and measurements are 32/34DD, 28” waist, and 38” hips, weight is approximately 135. The rise on the bottoms is not too low, nor too high. The top offers only light support so if you have naturally large breasts, that is something to consider. Overall a very cute suit especially for the price - I recommend it and will added a few other colors to the my collection!
customer_reviews.author: S. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Very Small Top, Very Large Bottom
customer_reviews.text: So disappointing! The material is beautiful, but I don’t know who would have the body shape of this suit. I got an extra-large because according to the size chart and clothes that I buy, I am a 16-18 in swimsuits. The bottom wasn’t bad, and I would have liked to have kept it. The top, however . . . oh, dear. Very skimpy, uncomfortable, and probably more like a size small. I couldn’t even get into it. Don’t bother unless you have a strangely shaped body.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, sizes are a little inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this swimsuit 3 times and it’s never really fit consistently. The first medium I ordered was perfect, the second was very loose , so I ordered a small (which was way too small). If you’re lucky enough to receive the right fit- it’s a great swimsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Cute style, teeny bottom.
customer_reviews.text: Nice color (the dark red) and fit. The top seems to be a good style for large and small chests. The bottom is "full coverage" (not cheeky as so many are), but is very teeny/low slung. I'm only 5ft tall, so I thought it might come up a little higher on me versus the models, but it doesn't. The elastic/stretch makes it seem like it would stay put quite well, but it's a little out of my comfort zone. Top will pair well with more modest black bottoms I have.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: What a surprise!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'8 and weigh around 170. I wear a size 12 and a 34 C/D bra: this bikini (in Large) fits perfectly! I had to remove the pads, but once I did - everything stayed neatly tucked in. The bottoms are just right too. The only pitfall may be the band after wearing the suit all day. It's pretty narrow and very "springy". Not sure how well this will work for those with heavier boobs, but I am very pleased. Will probably order more!
customer_reviews.author: Rockie

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite swimsuit!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’9 and 135 pounds, and I have to order a 8-10 so definitely size up a little. But regardless I love it!! It fits so well and actually covers my butt. I’m a C cup and the top is perfect. Must buy!!
customer_reviews.author: B-Dav

customer_reviews.title: looooooove this suit
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this suit. I have gotten so many compliments on it. Not only is the color great but the fit and style are too and the back of the top is too cute! I am 5’8 and 130 and ordered the medium. It fit perfect. I have wider Hips, bigger butt and the medium was great
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great option
customer_reviews.text: Great bathing suit! The small fits perfect. Very flattering. The seams on the straps are a tiny bit rough, but I’m hoping that will fade after a wash and wear. I have had 2 children and am small chested, yet inevitably there isn’t enough support on small sizes. This top offers decent support and is still flattering, and the bottoms are decent coverage as well while still being really cute. The color is beautiful, too.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren317

customer_reviews.title: Rich colors, nice material, good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: This is a prettier print than in the picture. I got the Aztec print. Very rich colors. I like this a lot. The top and bottom come packaged separately. Mine accidentally came with the correct size on top (s) and a size larger for the bottom (m). I think this works for me as I was a little concerned about the sizing on the bottom being too small anyway. But I recommend you check both when you receive them.
customer_reviews.author: J. M.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, order a size up
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality swimsiut, but it does run slightly small. I am 5'6", 120 lbs, 32DD, and I typically wear a small, sometimes a medium top, depending on the suit. I ordered a small, but the bottoms were a little tight. I sent it back and ordered a medium. The padding is removable, which I did remove. I have worn it to a water park and it keeps the girls in. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Pruns

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’2” 134 lbs and the small is a bit tight in the top and bottoms, but this works for me. The bottoms are good coverage, no wedgies!
customer_reviews.author: Kt007

customer_reviews.title: Bottoms were cut weird!
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit is super cute, but the bottoms fit strangely. The front is almost as big as the back and not in a good way! The front “bunched”, like it needed at least an inch of fabric removed. The top is adorable and fit great!! The Medium would have worked for me is the bottoms had been different. I’m afraid, if I had returned it for a small, the top would have then been too small. It’s too bad- it really is a cute suit!
customer_reviews.author: Amy R S

customer_reviews.title: Cool style, but runs a bit big
customer_reviews.text: I love the sporty feel of this suit and have actually recommended it to a few of my friends, but I wouldn't quite give it 5 stars due to the sizing. I typically wear a L bikini bottom (5'10", pear shaped size 8-10) and these L bottoms were just a bit too big. I will keep the suit, as I love the color and style, but I also plan on ordering it in a different color in a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Top is great
customer_reviews.text: I strictly bought this swimsuit for the top only as I had bottoms that I needed a top to. I am a 32c and ordered a small. The top is exactly what I was looking for. The fit was great. Held everything nicely in place and was sporty looking. I did try the bottoms on since I had them and they didn't fit right. The front crotch area poofed out some like there was too much material. Good thing I didn't need the bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie Kopp

customer_reviews.title: Bigger boobies, smaller waist
customer_reviews.text: I went into this purchase knowing I was ordering for the top, but I love. I'm 5'9" 160. Size 8/10 bottoms with 36DD breasts. I bought an XL and the top fit perfectly. I don't need underwires and that can be hard to find in a swimsuit top with this cup size. Obviously the bottoms are to big but that's fine $25 for a great top is what you pay anywhere. Ordering another one today in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Salty Redhead

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 4 bottom and size 8 top, so I ordered the medium. The bottoms fit fine. The top I can squeeze into only because the back style keeps it from falling off. In order to do so I had to take out the cup inserts. I bought it for a cruise, so considering what women tend to wear at the pool, the extra cleavage from being compressed into the top will be ok for a day. It's a very pretty color/pattern and nice suit style. I wish they sold them as separates.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Vibrant color, functional and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Fits well. Bottoms just a tad big but top was perfect! I’m 5’9, 180 lb, D cup, full butt. I ordered size large. Love the strappy design. Functional yet sexy. Only complain, which I overlook because I love this suit, is a little bit of the rubber sticks out of the band on top and pokes into my back. I only notice when I wear the suit all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top was too small
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute swim suit, but unfortunately, I have to return it. The problem I have with buying a bikini is I usually have to buy them as separates, since I usually need a bigger top than bottom. I decided to give this one a shot and ordered a size small, but I encountered my usual issue. The bottoms fit fine, but the top was too small. For reference, I'm 5'2", weigh about 105 and wear a 32D bra.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna H.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing suit!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in the mail today and it fits PERFECT! I was really expecting the top to fit and the bottoms to be too small but it’s good on both. I’m 5’5, 146lb athletic build with a 34Bish chest and larger booty. Top fits well, def would be room if your boobs were a bit bigger than mine but probs not too much bigger. The material seems sturdy. Looks so cute!!
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: Great color and quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and quality of this bathing suit. I ordered an XL because I usually wear that in most bathing suits because of my cup size. This one tends to be a little on the big side, but not bad. I am 28 weeks pregnant and ordered an XL. I weigh approximately 170 and am 5’5”. The only downside is that you can see the cups through the bathing suit, but that just might be the case with the color I selected.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Davis

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the sun!
customer_reviews.text: Loving this bathing suit! I have an athletic body type and most bathing suits do not fit right. The bottoms sit low on my hips and is loose enough not to cause muffin top. There is plenty of support in the top (36/D) for laying in the sun. I would not recommend swimming laps as it does not have that kind of support. Great suit for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Based on reviews, I ordered a small. It fit pretty perfect, and is comfortable, and seems to be decently made. I’m 5’4 117-119lbs, I wear 34D and 0-2 bottoms . It has a little more coverage than my husband likes, but it’s perfect for the neighborhood pool and chasing around my toddler. Side note: I usually have to buy my tops and bottoms separate because my tops have to be larger, but both top and bottom fit!
customer_reviews.author: janna

customer_reviews.title: Athletic girl's best friend!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a Hawaii vacation for my daughter. She's an athletic 14 year old girl and the small fit well. If we could've purchased separate sizes, I may have sized up for a medium bottom, because of her athletic buns. :) It held up really well in the sun/pool/ocean, the yellow color popped and she felt secure in the suit. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: SPROM

customer_reviews.title: Received with Stains, and damaged
customer_reviews.text: It seems as if the quality is good upon opening and I love the color, however the removable pads placed Inside are warped(like they’ve been washed), there are stain spots on one side(like it was worn and returned), and it seems to be falling a part already. I am so disappointed I was eager to get this after reading all the other reviews, I thought I had found one with good quality:(.
customer_reviews.author: ASHLEY EVANS

customer_reviews.title: great price, but WAY to small and NO SUPPORT ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product 3 stars because it was really cute, great price, but WAY to small and NO SUPPORT if you have boobs bigger than C cup, I wouldn't recommend it, I got a L and I am 34DD, I was spilling from top and bottom. Even if I went bigger there still wouldn't be support to hold me up. So if your smaller in the bust this is a great product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: got a Medium for my slender but curvy body
customer_reviews.text: Bathing suits that fit are soo hard to find. I was thrilled when I put this on, though. The top does smush my boobs down a bit, but nothing too bad. I am a 32DDD so finding bathing suit tops that aren't basically bras and don't cost $$$ is really hard. I have a 28" waist and 36" hips, 5' 5" and 130lbs. The bottoms are a little tight on my booty, but over all I love this bathing suit. When I went through the reviews I was shocked to see so many different body types saying how great it fit. Maybe it is just a really magical bathing suit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stayed in place all day at waterpark
customer_reviews.text: I needed a swimsuit that I didn't have to worry about anything slipping out while at a waterpark all day. This suit fit perfect and stayed in place, while looking cute too. I'm 5'2", 125 lbs and a 36A/B, ordered a small and fit perfect. and was comfortable. I ordered 2 colors because I couldn't decide and was planning to return one but I'm keeping both because it's a good all purpose suit.
customer_reviews.author: chitowncountry

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not great.
customer_reviews.text: I tried the white bikini in size Small. I am 5'4", 120, usually a size Small/2, 34B. This suit was not bad but not good enough to keep. The top is basically a sports bra with removable pads. It is not adjustable. The cut is nice, not revealing, and the racerback is cute. The bottom was good in the back, not "cheeky", and the side strappy detail was cute, but I found it really ill-fitting in front. The white is not lined, may be see-through when wet. On the plus side, the stitching/fabric quality is good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this bikini in black and immediately ordered a second color. It's incredibly comfortable, looks great on, and won't cause any irritation when worn under a wet suit top because there are no knots to dig into my skin. Heaven! I'm 5'3", 120lbs, 34b/26/36 Size small fits perfectly, snug without cutting into my hips and the top support is somewhere between sports bra and bralette. The top could be tighter but I'm sure the xs would be uncomfortable. I love it! It's comfortable, looks great, and won't cause weird bulges under clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'8 and usually wear an adult small. I went with a medium even though I am a small, according to the size chart. I like to have a good amount of coverage while wearing bikinis since I use them for beach volleyball and don't want to fall out while running. If you are around a size 4, I would go with a small if you want a tighter fit. If you want more coverage, I would recommend going up to a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The bottoms truly are as AWFUL as described in other reviews!
customer_reviews.text: The bottoms truly are as AWFUL as described in other reviews, which is sad because the top is perfect! I may take the top to Target and try and find a suitable bottom that matches well enough. I ordered this, despite numerous reviews complaining that the bottoms are more "speedo" than bikini. Well..... They weren't kidding! Ugh. So, so, so BAD.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Ocker

customer_reviews.title: Buy this suit
customer_reviews.text: Great suit, I bought the sm and was Leary as I’m petite, 4’10” 92lbs, 32B, usually take a xsmall. I’m no spring chicken, which means the girls attention span is long gone. 😉 This suit fits perfect! I’m a social butterfly,no worries about falling out, my little butt was covered, and I love it! Will be buying more colors to mix and match.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Edmonds

customer_reviews.title: Great value & quality.  Easiest bikini shopping ever!
customer_reviews.text: Great value and fit very well! I hate swimsuit shopping, but this was easy and such a great value. The fit and quality are great for the occasional weekend wear. Most swim suits tend to run small compared to usual sizing. This one does not. If anything, it runs a little large. I am 5'7, 130 lbs, and typically wear a size 6/34D. I ordered a Medium (typical for me) and it fits well, but it just a touch big. I am comfortable with that versus being squeezed into something smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and very flattering
customer_reviews.text: I saw all the great reviews and loved that tribal pattern so I took a chance and wow, it really superseded my expectations. It’s super-flattering, VERY comfortable, and the fabric is really soft, although a tad thin. I just bought two more in different patterns because I don’t know if this style will be available next year. Great suit!
customer_reviews.author: Zizou

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite swimsuit!
customer_reviews.text: The straps aren’t adjustable, but they aren’t weight-bearing, so they’re comfy. I was a little concerned about opacity with white, and as I hand washed the bottoms in the shower, they looked slightly translucent. But each time I asked a trusted friend after getting out of the pool, they confirmed I was not on display! The removable pads on top add a little bulk, but with my tiny little A cups it was welcome (and fortunately didn’t gap at all). The back had pretty good coverage—about as much as you’ll find in a bikini bottom. I am about 5’4-5”, 115#
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: I want a Refund!
customer_reviews.text: The bottoms were HUGE. And disproportionate to the top which fits true to size like a small. The top has a cute fit in the back, but that’s the only positive thing about this swimsuit sadly. The fabric is thin. The elastic is coming out and so it rubbed a red spot immediately when I tried it on. Too bad they won’t give me a refund. Very unhappy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and it flattens you out in a bad way. It's exactly what it says it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Nope, nope, nope. The cut is weird, the fit is miserable, and it flattens you out in a bad way. It's exactly what it says it is - a cheap internet bathing suit. Just don't do it. Spend the hour and go to Target and find one that actually fits.
customer_reviews.author: 5280KFB

customer_reviews.title: Great suit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 bathing suits before going to the beach in hopes at least one fit well- this was the winner! When I first unwrapped it I was intimidated by the complexity of it though. I thought for sure I was sending it back but instead I pulled up the picture of it and figured out how to wrap it. It looks fantastic and fits perfectly. Surprisingly it also stays in place while swimming too! Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Coverage
customer_reviews.text: This was the most comfortable bathing suit for me to wear four months after having a baby on my trip to Jamaica. I am 5’7 and was 165 pounds at the time(size 6-8 in clothes) and the medium fit great. I was a 36 C and the top was just a tad big but not big enough to be uncomfortable. The bottoms were what was impressive. They were the perfect amount of coverage...I wasn’t hanging out of them and they didn’t look like a granny either. Great suit for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin C

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommend! I bought 3!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this bathing suit. I ended up buying 3! I’m 5’6” 130 athletic build and got a small. The top fits perfectly. The bottoms are a little cheeky and low cut compared to my other bathing suits... but I love this suit. I use the top as a bra with some of my summer tops and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Kadie

customer_reviews.title: Cute suit that covers those cheeks
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 14 yr old daughter. She didn’t like the pics and told me don’t bother. Once it arrived she tried it on and loved it! My 17 yr old even borrowed it from her for a pool party. It has good coverage and support. We purchased the xs size in the pale pink color. They both usually wear a size zero and it fit them well.
customer_reviews.author: Christina R. Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Bottoms are okay - Top is too small
customer_reviews.text: Colors are true to photos. The bottom fits alright although it's a very low cut. The top is definitely too small for its size (L). I am 5'9", 171 lbs and wear an L in just about everything without problems. I'm a 38 C and this top would maybe fit a 36 C better than it fits me. I can still wear it in the pool at home, but I don't think I want to wear it in public. Makes my boobs look constricted :)
customer_reviews.author: bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful suit
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a suit that I could be active in and didn't have to worry about tying it or being worried about my body being exposed with activity. This suit is perfect for being active but yet wearing a stylish suit. I bought one at the beginning of summer and have worn it for multiple outdoor adventures. I loved it so much and for the reasonable cost decided to buy another one. I am 5'4 and weigh 118 lbs and ordered a small which fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size of top/bottom doesn't match
customer_reviews.text: As others mentioned, the top and bottom don't seem to match in size. The top is too tight and the bottom too loose. Cute design but not comfortable due to the mismatch in size.
customer_reviews.author: Belen Gutierrez Gomez

customer_reviews.title: lounge  or wear under wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: this suit is cute. not sure how long the shoulder straps would be comfortable. the bottoms definitely require a nonshy/toned bottom-however, the crotch part is wide enough without bunching. this suit would be good for hot-tub or if you plan on wearing board shorts and shirts over the top for playing in waves. i think this suit would work for many body types.
customer_reviews.author: lj

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I got this today and I am really impressed with the quality of the material for this price! I tried it on and it fits perfectly! I'm 5'6, 125ish lbs and I have basically 0 curves. With that being said the XS is perfect and it actually somehow gives the illusion on curves. At least more than 0. I would definitely reccomend and would also purchase in other colors!
customer_reviews.author: ANHW

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Best padding I've seen in a swimsuit, it is removable for those who don't want/need it. Fits pretty true to size, I'm usually a small top and med bottom but I went with a small. I'm 5'3, 117lbs. I love that it is a little more conservative than some swimsuits I've seen online. I love it so much i just ordered a red one!
customer_reviews.author: Puppylover

customer_reviews.title: Holds up over time & while pregnant!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a year ago and it's now my go-to swim suit. I got a Medium and I’m 38C about 145lbs... but I'm 9 months pregnant and now173 lbs and probably bigger bust and it still fits me. I prefer it to my maternity suit actually. It's comfortable, doesn't tug on my neck and doesnt come down in the water or if I'm running around playing frisbee. I would buy in other colors because it has proven to be such a good suit!
customer_reviews.author: StephB

customer_reviews.title: I'm super impressed with this suit
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I don't write reviews unless I'm really upset or really impressed. I'm super impressed with this suit! I am 5'3" and have a small frame. I read that this runs small so I ordered a medium and it is a perfect fit! It makes my poor mom boobs from breastfeeding look so much nicer hahah. I loved it so much that I ordered several colors
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Vowell

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Exceptional Price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this swimsuit. I ordered it in the smouldering navy and the color is exactly the same as the photo, a brilliant blue. I am 5'7" and 34B, I ordered the medium, because the reviews said it runs a little small. I could have pulled off the small but the medium isn't baggy just a tiny bit looser in the bust than I'm used to. The quality of the suit is exceptional, given the price, I expected a mediocre fabric and didn't know if it would be lined. Well, it's a great quality fabric, and lined. I'll definitely be ordering another style from this company in black!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa in Maine

customer_reviews.title: Flattering suit
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’2 & 110-115lbs. Double A on top. I ordered a MEDIUM & the top actually fits VERY comfortably. I dont like my tops too tight. The bottoms are a bit big but I plan on washing them on HOT & drying on HOT so hopefully they will shrink a tad. Overall- very pleased with the comfort & style of this bikini.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It’s very flattering and super cute. I am 5’1 and 125 lbs and I ordered the (4-6) and it fit perfectly. Hides all of my stretch marks from birthing babies but still shows off a bit of skin. 😊 The only complaint that I have is that there is not much room in the top, wishing I could’ve gotten a size up, but then the bottoms would be too big. The struggle is real!
customer_reviews.author: Vaneerd

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Decent swimsuit. I removed the padding from the top as it was very visible when worn. My only complaint is that there is no breast support at all. I kept it anyway and wore it all summer. I will be hunting for something similar with more breast support for next summer.
customer_reviews.author: Zelly

customer_reviews.title: Great suit!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! The bright blue is gorgeous. The top and bottom really stay put, which is great since it can be hard to get a cute sure that is also functional. I’m 146lbs, tall, A-cup, and got a medium. I do have a big rib cage (like I usually do a 38” bra), so it’s a teeeensy bit snug on top, but at least you know it’s not budging! Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: kd

customer_reviews.title: Too big of bottoms and too small of top!
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to make this purchase, as it is only one size for both, but it’s even harder to write the review. Quality of the material is just fine. Top is too small for my 34D bust and the bottoms are MUCH too large for my size 8/10 back end. Wouldn’t purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Ashlynn

customer_reviews.title: Nice fitting “sporty” looking swimsuit!
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised!! Top and bottom fit awesome!! I’m 5ft2in 34A about 135lb. Got a small. Everything feels secure and snug. The fit was great. Top included an insert which can be removed/replaced. Both had an inside lining. I was wanting a suit with no strings to tie or no clasps and this is it!! Might order in additional colors. I got the Everglade green but i think it’s a little more vibrant than the pic and I’d describe it as a dark peacock green.
customer_reviews.author: shakar

customer_reviews.title: Great price and awesome suit!
customer_reviews.text: I own a lot of Victoria Secret and J Crew suits..ladies...this beats them all. The price was amazing, the color was just as described and..its sexy without being revealing. I have young kids and have to wear a reliable suit when with them because they grab..but hated all the "mom" bikinis. When not w the kids, I wear more minimal cuts. I can wear this with and without the kids!
customer_reviews.author: ln2456

customer_reviews.title: The top is perfect. Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The top is perfect. Comfortable. Fits as expected, I chose size based on other reviews. I’m 155lb and soft AF and I ordered a large. The bottoms fit but the cut is bad. Like another reviewer, the front of the bottom was pouffey/saggy. I’ve got some junk in the trunk so definitely filled out the back. I actually only bought the suit because I liked the top and knew they would match some bottoms I have, so I’m not upset about the weird fit of the bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett LeBow

customer_reviews.title: Literally the most comfortable suit.
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'5, 148lbs, athletic build, I wear a size 34B bra size, and generally size 6 pants, (semi big booty), I ordered a medium and it fits perfectly. The bottoms don't give me any appeance of a muffin top, the top is comfortable. If I didn't have a drawer full of bathing suits, (or my BF wouldn't see the packages arrive in the mail), I would order another suit. -update: I ordered two more ;) totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Best suit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a similar style bathing suit from another seller. Product was junk so I was skeptical. I ended up purchasing one from this seller. I love it!!! Fits perfect. My husband even complimented it which never happens. Very very happy. Bought another one is another color. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute Suit
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute suit and fit as expected. I only wish I could have purchased the pieces separately as I am one size on the top (more wide) and smaller on the bottom so the suit bottoms are a little big on me. I still kept the suit though and may have my seamstress try to fix the bottoms LOL.
customer_reviews.author: tbsmom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I can never find a top that fits (36D) and the XL was literally perfect. I can't have halter tops because of the weight on my neck which makes this even better! As others have said, the green does show the padding but not dramatically. I absolutely LOVE this set.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Size 18 is definitely more of 13/14 but perfect buy!!! I ordered another color this week now I have black and euphoria pink and wear them constantly!! Update Bought a third - black with the white on the edges, Best bathing suit for someone with larger breast that still wants minimum coverage but can't wear a regular triangle top. I wear the bottoms backwards to make it a thong style too ;).
customer_reviews.author: abbi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vaca suit!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this suit! It fit well, I have problems with a small rib cage but bigger chest and I ordered the small hoping it would fit. I am 5' 112lb and 32C. Comfortable and loved the back pattern. Bottoms were a little loose in the frontal area but still loved them! :)
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Blue Lattice is Not Blue
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'1 and 100 lbs. I bought a size small and it fit very well. However, the color was not the color shown in the picture. Blue lattice is shown as blue in the picture. The product is actually dull in color and reads as back and white from far away. I'm disappointed that it wasn't blue.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: this suit was not as expected based on other customer reviews. The material was cheap and pretty see-through. It also didn't have any elasticity in it like you expect and need in a swimsuit. So it kind of just sat on my body and would completely just fall off if I were to try to swim in it. I don't recommend this suit unless you just don't care about quality at all. Plus side, it is cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: zeraca Women's Strap Side Bottom Halter Racerback Bikini Bathing Suits (FBA)
feature_bullets: Hand wash cold separately, only non-chlorine bleach when needed, do not iron,do not dry clean,do not wring or twist line dry , for best results, rinse and line dry immediately after use
Strappy bathing suit features v neckline with cinched detailing at bust, racerback with solid panel for striking look
Pullover style, Strappy side and back,Removable Push up Enhancement Padding
Contrasting strappy size, low rise,full seat, Moderate coverage for swimsuit bottom
Fully Lined for swimwear top and bottom.
XL 18 Top Bust 41-42.5 in 34DDD 36DD 36DDD 38DD 38D 38C Waist 33.5-35 Hip 44.5-46 in
